The **chromatic dragon**, D, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") introduced in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"). Chromatic dragons are a rare type of non-[unique](/wiki/Unique "Unique") [dragon](/wiki/Dragon_\(UnNetHack\) "Dragon (UnNetHack)") that share the same assortment of breath attacks and resistances as *the* [Chromatic Dragon](/wiki/Chromatic_Dragon "Chromatic Dragon"), the [Cave(wo)man](/wiki/Caveman "Caveman") [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis"), who is renamed Tiamat in *UnNetHack*; however, they have a lower difficulty level and lack Tiamat's [spellcasting](/wiki/Monster_spell "Monster spell") and sting attacks.

Chromatic dragons cannot be chosen as a polymorph form, and their eggs cannot be wished for.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 History](#History)
- [4 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)
- [5 References](#References)

## Generation

Although chromatic dragons are not considered [unique monsters](/wiki/Unique_monster "Unique monster"), they are not randomly generated, nor can they be [genocided](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide") (or reverse genocided). They are only found at the bottom of the [Dragon Caves](/wiki/Dragon_Caves "Dragon Caves"), a new [branch](/wiki/Branch "Branch") added to [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"), where several are guaranteed to appear in a lair.

Chromatic dragons are the only dragons in *UnNetHack* to lack a baby form; chromatic dragon eggs will hatch into fully-grown dragons. Like all dragons, they may drop their [scales](/wiki/Chromatic_dragon_scales "Chromatic dragon scales") [upon death](/wiki/Death_drop "Death drop").

## Strategy

Chromatic dragons are the source of [chromatic dragon scale mail](/wiki/Chromatic_dragon_scale_mail "Chromatic dragon scale mail") for many players; the scales and their mail confer the resistances of every variety of [dragon scale mail](/wiki/Dragon_scale_mail "Dragon scale mail"), including [petrification resistance](/wiki/Petrification_resistance "Petrification resistance") (conferred by the 'stone dragon', which has a [randomized name](/wiki/Dragon#UnNetHack "Dragon")) and [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) A [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for a statue of a figurine of a chromatic dragon is also worth considering, either to obtain scales in some manner or else keep as pets, and is the only way to generate them outside of the Dragon Caves; all statues are non-magical, so it is valid for a wish from a [magic lamp](/wiki/Magic_lamp "Magic lamp").

As of UnNetHack 5.2.0, these resistances also include magic resistance, since omitting it was a bug, however any chromatic dragon-related wishes (including for statues or figurines) are now disallowed. [\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

## History

In earlier versions, players could attempt to acquire chromatic dragon scales without entering the Dragon Caves by wishing for one or more chromatic dragon eggs; this option was eliminated as of development version r1580.

## Encyclopedia entry

Fearsome dragons who are channeling the powers of lesser dragons like their mother Tiamat. Legends tell of a far away realm where these creatures can be found in large numbers.
